original_text:
The Lord has opened his armory
    and brought out the weapons of his wrath,
for the Lord God of hosts has a work to do
    in the land of the Chaldeans.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 병기창을 열고 분노의 무기를 꺼냄은 주 만군의 여호와께서 갈대아 사람의 땅에 행할 일이 있음이라

sentences.original_text: The Lord has opened his armory
and brought out the weapons of his wrath
for the Lord God of hosts has a work to do
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 만군의 주 하나님께서 하실 일이 있기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: in the land of the Chaldeans
